name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience in harnessing modern cloud technologies including **GCP**, **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Terraform**, and **Jenkins** to drive efficient and scalable infrastructure solutions. Proficient in scripting with **Bash** and leveraging data stores such as **Mongo**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** to optimize performance in cloud environments. I am skilled in collaboration and incident management practices, ensuring high availability and reliability of services while aligning with best practices in **SRE**.

Additionally, I possess a strong foundation in **Python** development and have experience with Agile methodologies. My background includes utilizing **Grafana** and **Google Cloud Monitoring** for proactive monitoring and troubleshooting. I have led teams to implement CI/CD pipelines, enhancing deployment efficiency and reliability across various projects.
